channel.description: Recent content in Forecasting on Optionally Bayes

item.title: Mixture Density Network for Forecasting Realized Volatility
item.description: Using a mixture density neural network implemented in PyTorch to forecast the distribution of future realized volatility.

item.title: Bayesian Autoregressive Volatility Forecasting
item.description: Using a simple bayesian autoregressive model to forecast future volatility
